org.treetank.io.file

Class FileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.io.file.FileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackendReader

    public final class FileReader
extends Object
implements IBackendReader
    File Reader. Used for NodeReadTrx to provide read only access on a RandomAccessFile.
    Author:
    Marc Kramis, Seabix, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz.
